name: Infested Airlines
description:
Getting trapped in an airport during a zombie outbreak forced you to fight to stay alive. However, you aren't alone! Trapped somewhere in the airport are the doctor, scientist and soldier who can help you! If you find each other you will all be stronger together! 

Infested Airlines is a top-down shooter where you must survive waves of zombies and find allies. You can switch between weapons to fight against the zombies while searching for other survivors. Finding these survivors will give you buffs that just might increase your chances of staying alive.

--Controls--

Use wasd keys to move around and move your mouse to aim your weapons. You have access to 3 weapons that you can switch between with the number keys or mouse scroller. Finding other survivors will give you damage, health or speed buffs. Getting hit by the zombies will reduce your life. Stay alive as long as possible while avoiding zombies.

--Credits--

Coding: Dax

Art: Eric and Calum

Additional sound effects & soundtracks: Other sources and Eric
